summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1939, for the improvement of Canfield Place, in the City of Seattle, from North Fifty-fifth Street to Wallingford Avenue, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, and wood crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 20057, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
